rendered:
鶤鶤鶤
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

鶤字的基本解释

鶤
kūn
大鸡：“鸡三尺为鶤。”
〔鶤鸡〕凤凰的别称。
古书上说的一种像天鹅的大鸟：“翔鶤仰而弗逮。”

鶤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kūn］
［《廣韻》古渾切，平魂，見。］
［《廣韻》王問切，去問，云。］
大鸟。

鶤字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶤； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1495第10
【廣韻】【集韻】?王問切，音運。【爾雅·釋畜】雞三尺曰鶤。【郭註】陽溝巨鶤，古之良雞。【揚子·太?經】鶤雞朝飛踤於北，嚶嚶相和不輟食。又【張衡·西京賦】鴐鵝鴻鶤。【張揖曰】鶤雞黃白色，長頷赤喙。又【唐韻】古渾切【集韻】公渾切，?音昆。同鵾。【淮南子·覽冥訓】軼鶤雞於姑餘。【高誘註】鶤雞，鳳皇別名也。

鶤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鶤字的起名意思

暂无。

Kun
Basic explanation of words
Kun
kūn
Big chicken: "A chicken with three feet is a kun."
[Kunji] Another name for Phoenix.
The ancient book said a big bird like a swan: "Flying and flying up and fetching."
Kun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kūn］
["Guangyun" Gu Hun cut, Ping Hun, see. ]
["Guangyun" Wang Wenqie, go and ask, Yun. ]
Big bird.
Kun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鹍; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1495 No. 10
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wang Wenqi, Yinyun. 【Erya·Shi Hu】The chicken three feet called Kun. [Guo's Note] Yanggou Giant Kun, a good chicken of ancient times. 【Yangtze·Tai? Classics】Kunji flies towards the north, acquainted with each other and kept eating. Also 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】The Goose Hongkun. [Zhang Yi said] The Kook chicken is yellow and white, with a long chin and red beak. And [Tang Yun] Ancient Hun-cut [Jiyun] Gong Hun-cut,? Yinkun. Same Luan. [Huainanzi·Lan Ming Xun] Yi Kun Chicken Yu Guyu. [High lure note] Kunji, also known as Fenghuang.
Kun
